snippet.title: AUTOMOBILISTA Preview - Lancer Evo X Rallycross at Foz
snippet.description:
Check out another glimpse of Automobilista in action - this time the MIT Lancer Evo X pulling some drifts at Foz do Iguaçu in our brand new Rallycross mode! Car and track are based on the X-Games version which took place in 2013.

Automobilista - Motorsports Simulator will be realeased soon exclusively on the Steam platform.
